Manitoba Hydro sent a letter to Chief Bear and an email including the draft engagement sample work plan for the Project. The draft sample engagement work plan sent to First Nations on December 6, 2013 outlined potential opportunities for participating such as conducting an ATK study or workshop. Manitoba Hydro representatives explained that proposals initiated by the First Nation were welcomed, and that a sample proposal was available to assist with proposal
development, if required.

Name: 2013 04 25 Email to SCN Meeting follow-up.pdf
Description: Deirdre Zebrowski emailed Chief Genaille to inform him that after review of SCN's additional request for funding (as discussed at April 10 meeting) Manitoba Hydro is willing to seek approval for the work in the context of: informing the EPP in the form of sensitive site identification, 25 additional interviews, and participating in an EPP workshop(s) with MH. The email asked Chief Genaille if he is agreeable to this scope of work (enhanced EPP process) so MH can proceed with seeking approval and also offered to meet or further discuss, if necessary.
